input:

coverage: A ballet dancer is captured mid-leap, exuding graceful poise in every curve and extension. A spotlight dramatically highlights the dancer's movement, creating a captivating contrast against a backdrop of simple stage design with dark curtains. The lighting accentuates the elegance of the figure, casting soft shadows on the stage floor. The overall composition evokes a sense of elegance and dedication, drawing the viewer into the world of disciplined artistry and delicate, yet powerful, performance.
validityText:
The given input describes a subject (a ballet dancer) with specific characteristics (mid-leap with graceful poise), details about timing and lighting (spotlight highlighting movement), a description of the background (simple stage with dark curtains), and the feelings or emotions the image should evoke (elegance and dedication). Each aspect of the input matches an element specified in the input specification, meeting all the provided categories without any additional or missing information.

OK
